column1:
M_Tron_Hero_Kodiak,"2010-08-03T21:37:10.173Z","Excellent Horse Ranch","

Wonderful set, my sister when she was younger recieved this set for christmas.
column2: And I being the only of 3 siblings still enjoying legos, acquired the set.

column1: An awesome set, when we were younger it brought many hours of play.

column3: Fits will with lego and the theme this set was in.

column1: Building experience I give a 4 out of 5.
column2: Mainly because of the buildings and the parts used to make them.&nbsp
column3: As a kid it was a bit tough to build because of some pieces I wasn't used to, but everything else was great.

column1: Parts is a 3, the only pieces that really stand out are the doors and the roof plates.
Playability is awesome with you add other paradise sets or the smaller horse set with a trailer.
Don't remember how much it was back in the day, so

Overall if you have a little girl in your family that loves legos and horses, an excellent set!

",TRUE,5,3,4,4,3
